news.title: Trump signs bill ordering justice department to release Epstein files
news.summary: The bill gives the US Justice Department 30 days to release all the files in a searchable format.

news.title: The private notes and secret documents that tell the inside story of the UK's Covid response
news.summary: The Covid inquiry is set to publish its second set of findings looking in detail at the huge political decisions that had to be made in 2020.

news.title: US military officials in Ukraine for talks on ending war
news.summary: It comes amid reports the US and Russia have prepared a 28-point peace plan, allegedly containing major concessions for Ukraine.

news.title: Paying failed asylum seekers to leave is value for money, says Mahmood
news.summary: Home secretary says she will consider "a big increase" in payments to persuade people to leave the UK voluntarily.

news.title: Why Wales fell out of love with Labour
news.summary: After the Caerphilly by-election, Labour faces its toughest task yet in Wales - convincing voters to keep believing, ahead of the 2026 Senedd election

news.title: Ukrainian teen saboteurs recruited on Telegram to attack their own country
news.summary: Russia is using Telegram to recruit Ukrainian children and teenagers to carry out sabotage and bombings according to the Ukrainian government.

news.title: Now is not the time to tax electric vehicles, says Ford boss
news.summary: Ford's UK boss says it is "not the right time" to tax electric vehicles when demand has already stalled.

news.title: Nvidia shares jump after revenue and outlook top estimates
news.summary: The chip maker says revenue for the three months to October jumped 62% to $57bn.

news.title: Ripley's revealed as buyer of $12m golden toilet
news.summary: The first edition of Maurizio Cattelan's work was stolen from Blenheim Palace in 2019.

news.title: Perfectionism isn't all that perfect â€“ how to stop it holding you back
news.summary: Perfectionism looks good on paper, but its consequences might be the very thing keeping you stuck.
